article.headline: Bucknell 69, Rider 50
article.story: LEWISBURG, Pa. (AP) -- Kevin Bettencourt scored 19 points and Chris McNaughton had 13 points and 10 rebounds to lead Bucknell to a 69-50 victory over Rider on Friday. Charles Lee added 12 points for Bucknell (2-1), which led 33-20 at the half. The Bison outscored Rider (0-1) 16-5 to start the second half, with Bettencourt adding five to his first-half 10 points, to take a 49-25 lead with 14 minutes remaining. The Bison held a 37-25 rebounding edge for the game. Edwin Muniz scored 12 points for Rider while Steve Castleberry and Terrance Mouton each scored 10. Bucknell shot 56 percent from the field to Rider's 28 and held a 37-25 rebounding advantage.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.
